content.rendered:
Subscribe to the monthly newsletter of the Aerospace Engineering Blog

 

Each month I send out a digest of the newest posts and podcast episodes on this blog, as well as interesting book recommendations and other aerospace related articles, pictures and videos that I find across the internet.

 

If you want to stay up-to-date with the newest posts and podcast episodes, then please sign up below.

 

Otherwise you can also like the site on Facebook.

 

Don’t miss out. Sign up here:

jetpack-related-posts.title: Support
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Support the Aerospace Engineering Blog This website is a free educational resource and will always remain so. It is as much about me trying to pass on some of the things I have learned about aerospace engineering, as it is about me learning from interactions with readers (for a good…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Start Here
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Getting Started About -- A few notes about what this site is all about. Good reads -- Books about aerospace & engineering that I have read, and that I highly recommend to visitors of this blog. Newsletter -- Each month I send out a digest of the newest posts on…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Podcast
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This is an exciting time to be an aerospace engineer! Scientific breakthroughs in battery technology, machine learning, 3-D printing, and materials science are changing the way we design aircraft and rockets. These technologies have ushered in a new era in aerospace engineering, which will see transformations in the way we…

jetpack-related-posts.title: About this Blog
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Insights into Aerospace Engineering and Aviation On December 17, 1903 the bicycle mechanic Orville Wright successfully piloted the first heavier-than-air machine, his brother Wilbur running alongside him to prevent the wing tip from touching the floor. The Wright Flyer was constructed mainly from wood and canvas with a 12 horse-power petrol…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Privacy Policy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: What personal data Aerospace Engineering Blog (we) collect and why we collect it Newsletter You may subscribe to receive our monthly newsletter. Your email and name are never shared with anyone else, and your details are only kept until you unsubscribe. We use third-party vendor Mailchimp to distribute the newsletter. When…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Contact
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: I am a Royal Academy of Engineering Research Fellow and Lecturer in Digital Engineering of Structures based at the Bristol Composites Institute of the University of Bristol. My research focus is on lightweight design of engineering structures using composite materials (e.g. carbon-fibre reinforced plastics) and through multi-functional design (i.e. structures…
